group_1.textRight: A Witch is often lurking in the background@of many suicide and murder cases.
But they're not just behind major tragedies@like that.
Even when there are no deaths...
The curse of a Witch can be to blame for any@type of misfortune in the world.
Well, let's take the bullying that you've@suffered.
It's entirely possible that a Witch was@the cause.
People who are cursed hurt others.
Witches use curses to control minds...
Those who are under their control hurt@others…
Witches create a chain of misery by inciting@negative emotions.

group_1.textLeft: Negative emotions... A chain of misery...
If that's true...@If that's true, then I...
I-I'll do it!@As a Magical Girl, I'll do all I can!
To help build a kind world...where@people don't hurt each other!
I-I'm going to live!@[chara:302500:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:302500:cheek_1][chara:302500:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:302500:lipSynch_1]And I'm going to fight these Witches!

group_1.narration: Ever since then...@Though I'm pretty bad at it...@I've pushed forward as a Magical Girl.

group_1.textRight: So a Witch did play a role in your bullying.

group_1.textCenter: Seriously, you're just, like, so gross!@I wish you'd just disappear!
Isn't she creepy?@It hurts just looking at her.

group_1.textLeft: Why...? I beat the Witch that@was the cause of the bullying...

group_1.textRight: Yup. But there are still many more@Witches out there.

group_1.textLeft: If I beat all the Witches...@[chara:302500:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:302500:cheek_0][chara:302500:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302500:lipSynch_1]If I do that...!
Then there won't be anyone to hurt@other people?!

group_1.textRight: It's true that Witches are one reason@that people hurt others...
But I can't say for sure that getting rid@of them...

group_1.textCenter: (If I can't help get rid of all this@irrational pain in the world...)
I can't...@I don't want to live anymore...
